guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"54clu","text":"The optimized linear range in this assay for DNA is 0~100 ng/mL and RNA is 0~300 ng/mL in the microplate, respectively. Samples are diluted to 1/40 in the assay, therefore, maximum DNA and RNA required in the assay is around 4 ug and 12 ug per sample.
